channel.title: professional development on C'est la Z
channel.description: Recent content in professional development on C'est la Z

item.title: Computational Thinking in Primary Grades
item.description: Last week I spent a couple of days as part of a team running professional development for a group of pre and in service elementary school teachers. Two days talking about computational thinking. Wait a minute - elementary school teachers? I'm a high school guy pretending to be a college guy. My extensive experience with elementary school education is that I raised two kids and I don't think I messed them up too much.
